FuncDef: This command associates a filter policy with an ingress or egress Service Access Point (SAP). Filter policies control the forwarding and dropping of packets based on the matching criteria.

ParaDef.Info: indicates the filter policy is an IP filter.
Specifies the ID for the IP filter policy. Allowed values are an integer in the range of 1 and 65535 that corresponds to a previously created IP filter policy in the config>filter>ip-filter context.
